Work

I'm a Front End Developer at Delphic Digital and I Chair the Board for the WikiLogic Foundation in my spare time. That's a lot of time developing websites! To get in contact with me, try Twitter which I check semi-regularaly, or (if you're up for something more iteresting) use a pull request!
